questions.question: If you have a headache, you can bring some Tylenol to school

choices.answer: True, you can take any medicine you need at any time
False, students may not carry medicine (office only w/ note)

questions.question: Is it ok to go straight to your locker in the morning when you arrive to school?

choices.answer: No, you must wait in the cafeteria

questions.question: What does the counseling staff do in Student Services?

choices.answer: Helping w/ difficult home situations or conflicts at school

questions.resources: Mrs. Hollander, Mrs. Ledwidge, Mrs. Mah

questions.question: What is NOT expected if you are staying after school for an activity?

choices.answer: Students plan ahead of time if staying for an activity
Your ride picks you up on time

questions.question: What SHOULD you do with your locker?

choices.answer: Share your locker with a friend
Keep your locker clean and neat

questions.question: We Are MUIR!  What does it mean?
If you show outstanding citizenship and earn a Colt Card, you should not...

choices.answer: Make sure that your name is on it and bring it to the office
Listen for your name to be drawn on the announcements
Feel proud of yourself for being a leader
Run around the halls, doing cartwheels

questions.question: If you are out in the hall during class time, you must have teacher permission.
When walking in the halls or on the stairs, you should...
In the cafeteria at lunch time, which is true?

choices.answer: You can get in line whenever you want
You can leave the cafeteria whenever you want

questions.question: When is it appropriate to be using a phone?

choices.answer: In the hallways during passing time
In class when a teacher has given you permission
All of the responses are true
